entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
